name: touchspin-examples
description: Comprehensive examples for TouchSpin v5 across all frameworks and configurations

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd angular/angular-17-vanilla && npm install && cd ../angular-17-tailwind && npm install && cd ../angular-18-vanilla && npm install && cd ../angular-19-vanilla && npm install && cd ../angular-20-vanilla && npm install && cd ../../react/react-vanilla && npm install && cd ../../vue/vue3-vanilla && npm install && cd ../../svelte/svelte-vanilla && npm install && cd angular/angular-18-tailwind && npm install && cd angular/angular-19-tailwind && npm install && cd angular/angular-20-tailwind && npm install
scripts.clean:all: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf '{}' +
